product_name: Living ProofTriple Bond Complex Leave-In Hair Treatment
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackLiving Proof Triple Bond Complex is a weekly no-rinse treatment that makes hair 8x stronger*, resistant to future damage, and adds softness, smoothness + shine.
details: DetailsBenefitsClinically proven to rebuild the structure of your hair‚ÄØEasily added to your post-shower routine (after shampoo and conditioner), no added rinse out stepLeave on for 10 minutes before adding your styler and heat for best resultsHeat protection up to 450¬∞F/230¬∞ CBuilds all three types of bonds in the hair: hydrogen, ionic and covalent for short- and long-term benefitsRepairs hair from chemical, thermal, mechanical, and environmental damage‚ÄØ and protects hair from future damageFor all hair types and all levels of damagePETA-certifiedCruelty-freeColor SafeSafe for chemically treated hair*Against grooming breakage vs untreated**NPD Data FY 2021 US Prestige Beauty, Strength & Repair Haircare Product SalesKey Ingredients3D Fortifying Technology: Patent-pending technology that constructs a 3D network within the hair fiber, helping rebuild its structure and resist damage.Encapsulated cellular oil: Blend of lipids and peptides that deeply nourishes strands, helping defend hair against thermal and UV damage, and color fading.Biomimetic emollient blend: Smooths and aligns hair fibers, enhancing softness and shine.Cuticle-sealing agent. Smooths the surface of hair and makes hair more manageable for easier styling.Formulated WithoutSiliconeSulfate (SLS + SLES)ParabenPhthalatesFormaldehydeItem 2600419How To UseShampoo and Condition hair as usual.Then apply 2 pumps to clean, damp hair.Add more as needed based on hair length, texture, and level of damage.Comb through. Do not rinse out.For best results, wait 10 minutes before applying other treatments or stylers and blow dry.Product does not require heat but you will see best results with heat activation.Use weekly.Based on suggested usage, the 1.5 oz Triple Bond Complex should last an estimated 4 months/16 weeks.IngredientsWater/Eau/Aqua, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Isodecyl Oleate, Isopentyldiol, Dioctyldodecyl Dodecanedioate, Sodium Phytate, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Jojoba Esters, Linoleamidopropyl Dimethylamine Dimer Dilinoleate, C10-18 Triglycerides, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Glyceryl Ricinoleate, Cyclodextrin, Propanediol, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Ceteth-20, Steareth-20, PEG-75 Stearate, Polyglycerin-3, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Xanthan Gum, Caesalpinia Spinosa Gum, Fragrance/Parfum, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Gluconic Acid, Hydroxyacetophenone, Sodium Benzoate, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Citral, LimoneneShipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Shampoo and Condition hair as usual.Then apply 2 pumps to clean, damp hair.Add more as needed based on hair length, texture, and level of damage.Comb through. Do not rinse out.For best results, wait 10 minutes before applying other treatments or stylers and blow dry.Product does not require heat but you will see best results with heat activation.Use weekly.Based on suggested usage, the 1.5 oz Triple Bond Complex should last an estimated 4 months/16 weeks.

reviews.headline: Makes Hair Strong!
reviews.comments: I bought this on and off over the years, and I wasn't too impressed. I have started using this again based on Abbey Yung's recommendation.  It does not necessarily condition my hair or have that immediate wow effect. I still need my leave-in and oil afterwards. What it does do is make my hair much stronger!  Now, when I stop using this, my hair feels weaker. Try this, but give it time.

reviews.headline: Great buy
reviews.comments: I got a sample tube when I purchased their Dry Shampoo.  It lasted a long time. I bought this product when the sample ran out. I use it once a week. It makes my hair so soft and easy to style.

reviews.headline: Leaves hair manageable for many days
reviews.comments:
This is a fantastic addition to a wash day. It doesn't weigh my hair down and helps to reduce frizz. I feel like I can go longer between washes and it holds a style a little better. 

I do find that I need to dry my hair or use some hot tool to really see the benefits of this treatment.

reviews.headline: super soft hair!
reviews.comments: whenever I use this, I get compliments on my hair! I have fine hair, and this doesnt weigh it down. I use 1 pump. it leaves me hair super soft and I can tell the health of my hair is better. I gave one to my mom is is postmenopausal is struggling with very dry hair and it helped her a lot too. definitely recommend

reviews.headline: super soft hair!
reviews.comments: whenever I use this, I get compliments on my hair! I have fine hair, and this doesnt weigh it down. I use 1 pump. it leaves me hair super soft and I can tell the health of my hair is better. I gave one to my mom is is postmenopausal is struggling with very dry hair and it helped her a lot too. definitely recommend

reviews.headline: Sucks the life out of my bouncy, shiny hair
reviews.comments: Ok hear me out‚Ä¶ I am a hair product junkie.  I take the utmost care of my hair and only use salon products.  I do old-money blonde, heat protect like my life depends on it, and sleep in protective styles. I had washed and conditioned my hair and it felt like satin.  Buttah.  I put this in my damp, clean hair and immediately it turned to straw and my usual slippery comb through my hair was like battling the thick jungle brush with a plastic spork.  I'm sure it probably does improve hair quality and keep it strong - but don't expect it to make your hair feel like silk.  Maybe after you wash it again.

reviews.headline: Just what I needed!
reviews.comments: I've been super impressed with this product. My hair was starting to feel really dry and frizzy with the summer heat, but so glad I picked this up! I've noticed a difference from the first use - stronger hair, no more frizz, and the shine is back!

reviews.headline: Prefer leave in conditioner
reviews.comments: When I first used this product I was not impressed but realized I was using it wrong. After the 10 min set in I blow dried my hair and saw it did make my hair feel stronger. However, this product does make my hair slightly frizzy. It does smell good, but to be honest I prefer their restore leave in conditioner as that seems to work better for my hair.

reviews.headline: Haircare Super Hero
reviews.comments: Living Proof Triple Bond Complex is da bomb.com. I'm trying to grow out hair that was damaged from too many dye jobs, and the triple bond is helping immensely. I find I can go an extra month or two between trims without my hair becoming unmanageable. I'm super happy with it and will definitely keep using even after I trim off the last of my dyed hair. It's helping me get back to my stronger, natural hair!

reviews.headline: The BEST!
reviews.comments: I don't think my hair could have made a comeback without this stuff. I have my mom, my boss, and all if my girlfriends hooked on this bond repair cream now! I love that it takes just a few pumps and lasts for a few washes. I have noticed my hair improve dramatically since consistently using this.

reviews.headline: Regain strength
reviews.comments: I have fine hair and a lot of it! This product helped my hair regain it's strength. I apply once a week from nape of neck down and blow dry after 10 mins. Smooth and beautiful result.

reviews.headline: Most amazing leave in
reviews.comments: This repairs & nourishes hair so well! You will see a major difference in overall hair health with this!

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: I purchased this product at half price during the 21 Days of Beauty event. Prior to my purchase, I did plenty of product research on numerous websites and was super excited to try it out for it's high accolades! I have long, wavy, color treated hair and use 4 pumps and let air dry. It didn't smooth or shine. My hair was not soft and had lots of tangles. I add lots of leave in detangler and hair oil repair treatment to make this product somewhat tolerable while I use it all up because I refuse to waste money and throw away unused product.

reviews.headline: Awful
reviews.comments: I can't imagine this would help hair at all.  Used it once and my hair felt dried out.

reviews.headline: Good
reviews.comments: I think it does help with the texture of hair but not so much with the shine. Smell is good. Overall a better product

reviews.headline: Good
reviews.comments: I think it does help with the texture of hair but not so much with the shine. Smell is good. Overall a better product

reviews.headline: Recommend buying this product
reviews.comments: Leaves hair soft and looking great

reviews.headline: Great product!!
reviews.comments: I don't usually write reviews but this product works. It  gave my fine hair so much strength after just one use. I followed the instructions and applied only two pumps of the product to wet hair and let it sit for 10 minutes before I blow dried. I could noticeably tell that my hair was so much stronger. I will definitely continue to buy this product.

reviews.headline: Left hair worse than before
reviews.comments: This is the worst hair product I think I've ever tried. I had high hopes but it left my hair dry and tangly and lifeless. My hair looks horrible. I typically have nice hair but I color so I have slight damage. I can't get over how horrible this made it look!! I can't believe all the good reviews. This is a bad profuct.

reviews.headline: First use difference
reviews.comments: I bought this yesterday and used it this morning and oh my gosh! Such a difference since I did blue streaks a few werls ago.

faceoff_positive.comments:
On my wavy, blonde-dyed, frizzy, dry, rib-length caucasian hair with tons of split-ends and breakage, this made a notable difference after one application on just-washed hair withiut blow-drying or styling, just air drying. 

I then read more about the product and found that without heat, one of the 3 bonds, the covalent bond, would not be activated, so the next day, on dry hair, I misted my hair until it was pretty wet, let that water sink in for a bit, then combed it, applied this prodict, combed it again, waited over 10 mins, like 12-15 mins, then blow dryed, and the improved look of my hair was even more pronounced, like my hair looked stronger and somewhat healthier, thiugh my hair still has a ways to go to get it back to looking truly healthy because of how dry and broken it was to start.

The first time, on just washed and air-dried hair without heat, I used 6 pumps. The 2nd time, with blow dryer heat on day-old misted hair, I used 8 pumps. The 2nd time, it took longer to dry my hair than it usually would with the blow dryer, and I worried that I had put too much on, but at the end of really drying it, my hair looked fine. Both times, I applied the product on the lower 2/3rds of my hair. Because I'm seeing a notable positive change, I'm tempted to do it even yet again on 2nd-day-old hair with the misting again! Had I blown it dry the first application, my results so far would like have been even greater!

It's worth it to at least try this, IMHO, and to apply the heat to get the best results. I am more than happy with my results, particularly because most things do nothing to improve my hair that I can tell. The idea of having strong hair without constant split-ends and breakage was one I had mostly given up on. (I eat well, sleep on satin or silk pillowcases, use gentle shampoo & conditioning products, apply protectants, leave-ins, and oils, usually air dry my hair, use special soft hair towels, wide tooth combs, etc., and my hair still doesn't look great, but now it looks better!)
faceoff_positive.headline: At least try it!

faceoff_negative.comments:
Gifted by Living Proof. I was super excited f or the opportunity to try this product.  Unfortunately, I was greatly dissappointed.  This is a leave-in hair repair treatment, triple bond complex that is suppose to make your hair stronger, smoother, and shinier after just one use.  Unfortunately that is not the result I got.  My hair didn't feel smoother, or shinier, it felt dry and it felt in worse condition than what it had been in.   I was really expecting this product to have a better result.  The packaging is nice, with a pump.
It is odd that we are only suppose to use it once a week, for being a leave-in.  I didn't wait a week to try it again.  I tried a few days later to see if I would give me a different result.  I still got the same result, not shiny or smooth, but dry!  It does say this product does not require heat but that we will see best results with heat activation!  I mean maybe that would smooth my hair out but it still shouldn't make my hair feel worse than what it was, right!?  Plus I don't want to have to put heat on it just to get the product to WORK!
I love other Living Proof products, so yes this was a let down for me!
faceoff_negative.headline: Big disappointment!
